questions.questionTitle: What can be inferred about the speakers?
anwers: They work for a coffee company.
Their business is not doing well.

questions.questionTitle: What does the woman say about House of Coffee?
anwers: It has a new mocha freeze.
They are using a new type of bean.

script:
� I heard that House of Coffee is going to close 200 stores. Their business is really hurting.
� Yeah, well, that may be. But they're still 500 stores ahead of us.
� Not for much longer. Our sales are increasing each quarter, and our new mocha freeze is really taking off. 
� It is! At this rate, we'll catch up to them sometime in the next five years.
